name: MK Google Directions
author: Web Tamarin

sections.description:
MK Google Directions : Enable use of Google Directions in your WordPress blog. It also give details of distance between two locations and also shows driving direction between two places.

Google Maps gives you the ability to generate directions between start and end point. This plugin uses Google Maps API to embed the Google Direction to your WordPress Blog. This plugin will show the route on the map and also give detailed directions between two points.

  • Shows Google driving directions on map.
  • Shows distance between two places.
  • Shows time taken to travel between two places.
  • Shows step by step driving directions.

For more details: Click here

Created By: Manoj Rana

Email : manoj.rana91986@gmail.com

MK Google Directions Features

  • Shows Google driving directions on map.
  • Shows distance between two places.
  • Supports multiple languages.
  • Distance can be displayed both in miles and kilometers.
  • Shows time taken to travel between two places.
  • Shows step by step driving directions.
  • Start/Destination locations can be set from admin dashboard.
  • Moblie devices compatible.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the plugin to your /wp-content/plugins/ directory.

  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.

  3. You can now see the “MK-GD” menu tab appearing in admin panel.

  4. Click on the “MK-GD” menu to create new Google Direction Maps.

  5. Use [MKGD id=”postID”] shortcode in your post/page.
sections.faq:
Can I add plugin to posts/page

Use [MKGD id=”postID”] shortcode.
sections.changelog:
1.0

1.1

  • Released on 5/30/2011

2.0

  • Plugin upgraded to WordPress 3.5.
  • Released on 04/23/2013

2.1

  • Content filter issues fixed.
  • Released on 04/30/2013

2.2

  • Unit system can be switched between Metric & Imperial. Now the distance can be get in miles or kilometers.
  • Released on 01/20/2014

2.2.1

  • Compatible on mobile devices.
  • Released on 06/09/2014

2.2.2

  • Option to set a default start location added.
  • Hide/Show start location field according to your needs.
  • Released on 07/07/2014

2.2.3

  • Option to set a default destination location added.
  • Hide/Show destination location field according to your needs.
  • Released on 07/08/2014

3.0

  • Use on latest Google Direction API’s.
  • Use of custom post types to add any number of maps.
  • New UI and rewritten code-base.
  • Released on 05/19/2023

3.1

  • Fixed some CSS and coding bugs.
  • Released on 03/06/2024
sections.reviews:
Works like a charm!

By whitehatstrategy on January 26, 2024

Not sure why others don't absolutely love this plugin, but it allows us to add a section directly under our Google Map providing step by step directions to our business. Two thumbs up!

Broke our HTTPS site

By (fastfastlane) on September 3, 2016

If you have an HTTPS site I do not recommend using this plugin.

It broke our site and had a hard time to discover it was actually this plugin, which worked temporarily.

It uses Google Font Oswald which will not update to HTTPS even with plugins to force it to HTTPS.

Broke our site, had to re-write the entire Contact page.

Tried to contact the author and the website has been deleted. Not a good sign.

Not working

By Marinos (HelpPost.gr) on February 7, 2017

Not working for me ...
http://prntscr.com/34yuep
..This plugin was almost exactly what i needed ....
